title: Adventure Sci-Fi Music
description: 10 tracks in two versions - with tail and loopable, atmospheric electronic, with vibrant drums.
longDescription:
GALAXIA | Adventure Sci-fi Music

by Wiktoria Zac


LISTEN NOW


This music pack contains 10 music tracks in two variations (full with tail and seamless loops, which gives 20 tracks total).

Designed for Sci-Fi, Futuristic Worlds, RPGs, and everything in between! Perfect for promotional purposes. The tracks have been created using the best quality tools and techniques.


The pack includes:

➼ 10 Professionally mastered original tracks in two variations

➼ Minutes of audio provided: full 33min 31sec | seamless loops 32min 48sec

➼ 24/44.1 kHz .wav format


TRACKLIST (44.1kHz, 24bit, Stereo)

▶ Plasma | full mix - 3:31 | loop - 3:28

▶ Hologram | full mix - 3:18 | loop - 3:12

▶ Antigravity | full mix - 3:16 | loop - 3:12

▶ Comet | full mix - 2:46 | loop - 2:42

▶ Asteroid | full mix - 3:03 | loop - 3:00

▶ Teleport | full mix - 3:15 | loop - 3:12

▶ Android | full mix - 3:52 | loop - 3:49

▶ Supernova | full mix - 3:29 | loop - 3:24

▶ Clone | full mix - 3:19 | loop - 3:12

▶ Particles | full mix - 3:42 | loop - 3:37


►If you're looking for original music for your project, feel free to reach out to me at wiktoriazac@gmail.com
technicalDetails:
Number of Audio Wavs: 20
